greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of compositions of n with no two consecutive identical parts that have exactly k parts = 1, n>=0, 0<=k<=ceiling(n/3).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..250, flattened
maple: b:= proc(n, t) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, expand(
T:= n-> seq(coeff(b(n, 0), x, i), i=0..ceil(n/3)):
results.author: _Geoffrey Critzer_, Nov 23 2013
